actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require publication of certain information relating to multicandidate political committees.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to compile by April 15 of each year specified information regarding certain multicandidate political committees. Requires such information to be printed in the Congressional Record.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require publication of certain information relating to multicandidate political committees.
